content.raw:
I tested this on bender (Ubuntu 12.04, ATI video card, ogre 1.7.4), and it segfaults during the Distortion test (all the other tests are fine).
~~~
[ RUN      ] CameraSensor.CheckDistortion
...
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:144] ServerFixture load in 2.1 seconds, timeout after 600 seconds

Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
0x00007ffff0d75f91 in Ogre::CompositorInstance::setEnabled(bool) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOgreMain.so.1.7.4
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007ffff0d75f91 in Ogre::CompositorInstance::setEnabled(bool) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOgreMain.so.1.7.4
#1  0x00007ffff6f95919 in gazebo::rendering::Distortion::SetCamera (
    this=0x7fff930c1780, _camera=...)
    at /home/osrf/ws/gazebo_sdformat/src/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Distortion.cc:202
#2  0x00007ffff6f704d0 in gazebo::rendering::Camera::SetRenderTarget (
    this=0x7fff93844470, _target=<optimized out>)
    at /home/osrf/ws/gazebo_sdformat/src/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Camera.cc:1337
#3  0x00007ffff6f6c87d in gazebo::rendering::Camera::CreateRenderTexture (
    this=0x7fff93844470, _textureName=...)
    at /home/osrf/ws/gazebo_sdformat/src/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Camera.cc:1228
#4  0x00007ffff72d8f27 in gazebo::sensors::CameraSensor::Init (
    this=0x7fff98086480)
    at /home/osrf/ws/gazebo_sdformat/src/gazebo/gazebo/sensors/CameraSensor.cc:133
#5  0x00007ffff731ae2a in gazebo::sensors::SensorManager::Update (
    this=0x7ffff78f2360, _force=false)
    at /home/osrf/ws/gazebo_sdformat/src/gazebo/gazebo/sensors/SensorManager.cc:114
#6  0x000000000045fab8 in gazebo::Server::Run (this=0x7fff9204f210)
    at /home/osrf/ws/gazebo_sdformat/src/gazebo/gazebo/Server.cc:475
#7  0x0000000000442693 in ServerFixture::RunServer (this=0x738300, 
    _worldFilename=..., _paused=false, _physics=...)
    at /home/osrf/ws/gazebo_sdformat/src/gazebo/test/ServerFixture.cc:233
#8  0x00007ffff5ac8ce9 in thread_proxy ()
   from /usr/lib/libboost_thread.so.1.46.1
#9  0x00007ffff66cee9a in start_thread ()
   from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.so.0
#10 0x00007ffff472a3fd in clone () from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6
#11 0x0000000000000000 in ?? ()
(gdb) 
~~~
content.html:
I tested this on bender (Ubuntu 12.04, ATI video card, ogre 1.7.4), and it segfaults during the Distortion test (all the other tests are fine).

[ RUN      ] CameraSensor.CheckDistortion
...
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:144] ServerFixture load in 2.1 seconds, timeout after 600 seconds

Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
0x00007ffff0d75f91 in Ogre::CompositorInstance::setEnabled(bool) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOgreMain.so.1.7.4
